column5: this was a last year back on sturgeon lake at one of the docks i use to fish off . Using a 4' floating minnow bait for bass this guy decided to take it . Its my personal best crappie to date.
how can i add a picture it says its to big on my computer is there an app ?
Most people here use Photobucket. Just drop your pics in there and copy the URLs to your post here.
